statement: Following the previous problem, let's consider that Jaden has made some changes on his farm that affected the milk production in the evening. Now, his cows give him 28/10 gallons of milk per cow in the evening instead of the previous 28/20 gallons. If we still take the morning milk production as 26/14 gallons per cow, how much milk is he getting from one cow in one day now?
new symbolic struct:
[[var milk_morning_new = 26/14]]
[[var milk_evening_new = 28/10]]
[[var total_milk_per_cow_new = milk_morning_new * milk_evening_new]]
